PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-21392001-11-220,  ,  INDUSTRY,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the CANADA BUSINESS CORPORATIONS REGULATIONS, 2001 which replace the former Regulations and introduce new provisions dealing with electronic documents, directors' residency, corporate inter-relationships, insider trading, electronic shareholders meetings, shareholder proposals, proxy solicitation and proxy circular exemptions, modified proportionate liability and the cancellation of certificates.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0512 Publication Date: 2001-12-05
Attachments
